message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with the problem of image captioning, which involves both computer vision and natural language processing techniques. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also compares different approaches for solving the image captioning problem, which involves machine learning and deep learning techniques, making cs.CL (Computation and Language) another likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper aims to improve the state of the art in image captioning, which falls under the sub-categories of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Finally, the paper evaluates the performance of the models using sentence comparison metrics, which is related to information retrieval, making cs.IR (Information Retrieval) a possible sub-category as well.
